revised_title: Anatomical Observations on Thomas Parre, Aged 152 Years
tldr: Dr. Harvey's anatomical account of Thomas Parre, who lived to be 152 years old, reveals that despite his advanced age, his body was still very fleshy, and his organs were strong and healthy. The cause of his death was attributed to changes in diet and air, as he transitioned from a simple country life to a more luxurious lifestyle in London.
